summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center Department; authorizing an amendment of the Concession Agreements between the City and William H. and Pamela Lewis; Sports Stop, Inc.; Debra Flemming; Thomas C. Webb; Robert Fritz, Ralph's Toys, Hobbies, Cards and Gifts, Inc.; May K.M. and Joe P. T Yeung; Duane and Lillian Payne; and Christopher Paul Bollen, respectively, to reduce the fees and charges payable thereunder in recognition of a mutual mistake and unforeseen and unanticipated economic circumstances, and to make other minor adjustments in the form of such agreements.
